long_description: With focus on a solid ride and a simple design, the K2 Formula snowboard bindings are at home in the park or on the steeps. Cushioned baseplates soften your landings when you go big. Padded Rocklock highbacks feature asymmetric shaping to support a natural stance and provide seamless power transfer to your board; tool-free forward lean adjustment. Pro Fusion GF chassis offer a performance flex for advanced riders; they feature tool-free power ramps and multi-position ankle and toe strap mounts. Baseplates feature canted, seamless EVA footbeds with polycarbonate support frames that reduce snow buildup; inward canting improves control and reduces fatigue. Caddi ankle straps feature a contoured 3D shape for free-flexing mobility and durable EVA padding for a cushioned fit; tool-free centering adjustment. EZ Set toe straps fit over the toes or on top of the boots; top and bottom of strap adjust independently for a custom fit. MEGA RADchet ratchets feature large aluminum levers for easy operation. EZ-Feed ratchets feature an easy-feeding, tapered ladder opening for fast entry. These bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
